WRITING.TITLE: Self-Portrait, oil, 16x20, I painted this while my kids worked.

WRITING.TEXT: Huh surprised he fell that far. Many had him going in the 1st.
Am I missing something about Awuzie? I thought he would of been picked by now.
But what if its McCaffrey? I know he's considered a RB but he would play a lot of slot.

WRITING.TITLE: Does the Blue Devil mascot have a name?
WRITING.TEXT: I work in a district where our mascot is also the Blue Devil and some district officials are wanting to give the mascot a name other than the "blue devil". I was looking for help. Is the Duke Blue Devil referred to as the "blue devil" or does he have some sort of surname?
I like that news for a day that hasn't had much.
Love it! Rod Woodson is a great addition.

The years when he doesn't get hurt he hits a 1000 yrds. I understand that this isn't 2012 AP but the guy is a physical specimen. Less reps because of position depth, behind arguably the best line in the league, I think (for the right price of course) it could work. I would love to see AP run over Von Miller for a 2 yrd touchdown.
$4 mil tops! $1 mill bonus for 1000 yrds.
Is there a story to this?
